full_summary:
### Article Title:
Insurance Course Training Sessions and Insurance Advice Tender

### Tender Information

*   **Procurement Number:** 21120-23-4265820/01
*   **Tender Closing Date:** July 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   **Publication Date:** June 26, 2023
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Description of the Work

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a supplier to provide insurance course training sessions and insurance advice. The objective is to develop and deliver training sessions on the government's standard insurance terms to buyers within the Correctional Service Canada, increasing their understanding of contract insurance requirements.

The contract also requires the supplier to assist in determining whether contractors' insurance policies meet contract security requirements on an as and when requested basis.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

*   Price (lowest price proposal will be considered)

### Documents

You can download the solicitation document and evaluation criteria from the Government of Canada's [Tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) website. The solicitation documents are available in both English and French.

### Additional Resources

Seminars on [Procurement for Businesses](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/purchasing/market-research/procurement-for-businesses) and [Bidding on Government Contracts](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/purchasing/canadian-businesses/participate-in-the-government-of-canadas-commissioned-procurement/bidding-on-government-contracts) are available to help businesses learn how to sell their products and services to the Government of Canada.

### Contact Information

*   Name: Danielle Blanchet
*   Email: [Danielle.Blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Danielle.Blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (506) 377-9624

Note: The contact information is provided to assist with any inquiries regarding the tender. You should not reach out to this contact for any discussions on the substance of the bid.
